4e6b1d31.title: Fix security: Possible binding to all interfaces.

add8d9c7.title: Fix security: Using xml.etree.ElementTree to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace xml.etree.ElementTree with the equivalent defusedxml package, or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called.

259fd9a9.title: Fix security: Using xml.dom.minidom.parseString to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace xml.dom.minidom.parseString with its defusedxml equivalent function or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called

a018be60.title: Fix security: Use of assert detected. The enclosed code will be removed when compiling to optimised byte code.

e071801f.title: Fix security: Use of possibly insecure function - consider using safer ast.literal_eval.

538688f5.title: Fix security: Try, Except, Pass detected.

78fc666f.title: Fix security: Consider possible security implications associated with pickle module.

736a61aa.title: Fix security: Use of exec detected.

f7e57821.title: Fix security: subprocess call - check for execution of untrusted input.

17a27947.title: Fix security: Deserialization with the marshal module is possibly dangerous.

6c3b87ff.title: Fix security: Audit url open for permitted schemes. Allowing use of file:/ or custom schemes is often unexpected.

49552076.title: Fix security: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.

a8c51a31.title: Fix security: Mako templates allow HTML/JS rendering by default and are inherently open to XSS attacks. Ensure variables in all templates are properly sanitized via the 'n', 'h' or 'x' flags (depending on context). For example, to HTML escape the variable 'data' do ${ data |h }.

d48e1043.title: Fix security: Function call with shell=True parameter identified, possible security issue.

ae2e6256.title: Fix security: Use of extra potential SQL attack vector.

2827015e.title: Fix security: Pickle and modules that wrap it can be unsafe when used to deserialize untrusted data, possible security issue.

21891bff.title: Fix security: Standard pseudo-random generators are not suitable for security/cryptographic purposes.

e05740db.title: Fix security: Probable insecure usage of temp file/directory.
